.. rst-class:: sphx-glr-example-title

.. _sphx_glr_auto_examples_plot_lagcrp.py:


=============================
Plot Lag-CRP
=============================

This example plots a Lag-CRP as described in Kahana et al (1996).
Given the recall of a stimulus in position n, this plot shows the probability of
recalling stimuli in neighboring stimulus positions (n+/-5).

.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 12-26



.. image-sg:: /auto_examples/images/sphx_glr_plot_lagcrp_001.png
   :alt: Lag-CRP
   :srcset: /auto_examples/images/sphx_glr_plot_lagcrp_001.png
   :class: sphx-glr-single-img

|

.. code-block:: Python


    # Code source: Contextual Dynamics Laboratory
    # License: MIT

    # import
    import quail

    # load data
    egg = quail.load('example')

    # analyze and plot
    fegg = egg.analyze('lagcrp', listgroup=['average']*8)

    fegg.plot(title='Lag-CRP')

   **Total running time of the script:** (0 minutes 0.868 seconds)
